title: Accessible Icon Project
synopsis: In collaboration with [[Sara Hendren]], redesigned the website of this widely-known design intervention, distilling it to a single page and foregrounding the project's story and manifesto.

title: Engineering at Home
synopsis: A 6-month long collaboration with anthropologist [[Caitrin Lynch]] and designer [[Sara Hendren]], of Olin College, to produce an interactive archive that frames their academic research for a broad internet readership.

title: Multi Entry
synopsis: Pair-programmed with ethnographer [[Christina Xu]], walking her through setting up her own site to document research into China's creative culture. Answered questions and solved problems together as they arose.

title: Tools
synopsis: What I use to do my work:
